About the Package ================================ Kubernetes is an open-source system for managing containerized applications. It groups containers that make up an application into logical units for easy management and discovery.
=Supported versions= 1.9.0
=Setup= * Oracle JRE 1.7 must be installed on Agent OS and "java" must be set as executable on the same. * The Agent should be able to access Kubernetes Server URL. * Path to Kubectl.exe should be set in PATH environment Variable.
=Variables= (none)
=Common Input= -Server URL: Specify address and port of the Kubernetes server E.g. https://192.168.41.155:6443 -Username: Username used for Kubernetes connections. E.g. Admin -Password: Password used for Kubernetes connections. -Kube Config Path: Specify path to the kubeconfig file to use for CLI requests. E.g. /home/username/.kube/config -Kube Config Context: Specify the name of the kubeconfig context to use. E.g. minikube -Cluster: Specify the name of the kubeconfig cluster to use. E.g. kubernetes -Skip TLS Verification: If Yes, the server's certificate will not be checked for validity. E.g. Yes, No -Client Certificate Path: Specify path to a client certificate file for the certificate authority. E.g. /home/username/kubernetes/ca.cert
=Actions= Following actions are supported.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KUBERNETES.PUB.ACTION.GET_RESOURCE * Action description: This action will fetch resource(s) in Kubernetes according to type and filters.
